channel.title: Documentation on LINTENG'S BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on LINTENG'S BLOG

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Welcome to the Mainroad theme documentation. This quick start guide covers Mainroad theme installation and minimal configuration and is intended for intermediate to advanced users. To understand this guide, you need to be familiar with the Hugo static site generator.

item.title: Customization
item.description: Customization page describes common Mainroad configuration parameters which can be specified via configuration file or via Front Matter section. That includes logo section tuning, adding a sidebar with widgets, adjusting highlight color, and more.

item.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
item.description: Browse this FAQ page to find answers to frequently asked questions that have not been covered elsewhere in the documentation.

item.title: 842考研
item.description: 《842考研》是我备考时写的博客，记录了199x-2016年东北大学842专业课（C语言、数据结构）部分代码，由于时间有限并没有完整的题目，欢迎提交PR补充。 我的考研路 在SAU图书馆回顾了考研历程。 东北大学842考研 代码详情。

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Linteng Wang. I’m a Machine Learning Engineer working in NLP, news recommendation and LLM at Sina Weibo. Previously, I was a Machine Learning Intern at Meituan working in Anti-Cheat in the Bike Share Team. This blog is my little corner of the internet! Education Master (Sep 2017 - Jun 2020) Liaoning University - Computer Application Technology Bachelor (Sep 2013 - Jun 2017) Shenyang Aerospace University - Information Management and Information System
